message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I've had a few customers who have purchased similar products from me in the past, and they've been very satisfied with the quality. I'm confident you'll love this one too!
I'll take the product, thank you!

I want to assure you that this product is still a great value at $100. It may not be the best product I have, but it's a solid option that will get the job done. Plus, I'm offering a special 'value guarantee' - if you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a refund... on the next product you buy from me. So, what do you say?
I'm not sure about this one, I'll pass for now.

I know you were hesitant last time, but I want to assure you that this product is a great opportunity to get a good deal. I've already made a significant loss on this one, and I'm willing to let it go for $100. Plus, think of it as a chance to try out a product without any risk - if you don't like it, you can always return it to me and I'll give you a full refund. It's a no-brainer, right?
I'm not convinced, I'll pass again.

I've got a great one for you today! This product is top-notch, and I'm confident you'll love it. I've already sold a few high-quality products to other customers, and they've all been thrilled. In fact, I'm so confident in this one that I'll give you an exclusive deal - if you buy this product, I'll throw in a free inspection and maintenance service, worth $25, absolutely free. That's a $125 value, yours for just $100!
I'll take the product and the free inspection and maintenance service, thank you!

You're on a roll! I've got another high-quality product for you, and I think you'll love it just as much as the last one. I've got a special promotion going on today - if you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% discount on your next purchase. That's right, you'll get this great product for $90, and then you'll be able to get your next product for 10% off. It's a win-win!
I'll take the product and the 10% discount on my next purchase, sounds like a great deal!

You're really making the most of my promotions! I've got another high-quality product for you, and I think you'll be impressed. I want to make it even sweeter for you, so I'll give you an additional 5% off the original price, making it $95. Plus, I'll throw in a personalized thank-you note and a guarantee that I'll be available to answer any questions you may have about the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it!
I'll take the product and the personalized thank-you note and guarantee, thank you!

I know you've been on a roll with the high-quality products, but I've got a special opportunity for you today. This product is a bit of a'stepping stone' for me, and I'm willing to let it go for $100. Think of it as a chance to support a small business owner who's just trying to clear out some inventory. Plus, I'll give you a 'pre-inspection' guarantee - I'll give you a heads up if there's anything wrong with the product, so you can make an informed decision. It's a unique chance to get a great deal on a product that might not be perfect, but still has some value.
I'm not sure about this one, I'll pass for now.

I completely understand your hesitation, but I want to sweeten the deal for you. I'll give you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy on this product. If you're not satisfied with it, you can bring it back to me and I'll give you a full refund, no hassle. And, I'll even throw in a $10 gift card to use on your next purchase. It's a risk-free way to try out a product that might not be perfect, but still has some value.
I'm still not convinced, I'll pass again.

I've got a bit of a confession to make - this product isn't my best work. But, I'm willing to let it go for $100, and I'll give you a'makeup' gift - a free accessory that complements the product perfectly. It's not a high-quality product, but it's still worth something, and you can use the accessory to get the most out of it. Plus, I'll give you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy, like I mentioned before. It's a chance to get something for cheap, and still get some value out of it.
I'm not interested in a low-quality product, even with a free accessory.

I understand you're not interested in low-quality products, but I want to make you a deal that's hard to refuse. I'll give you this product for $50, and I'll throw in a second, identical product that you can use as a backup or give to a friend. That's two products for the price of one. It's a great opportunity to stock up and save some money, even if the individual products aren't perfect.
I'm not interested in buying two low-quality products, even at a discounted price.

I'm willing to go even lower on the price. I'll give you this product for $25, and I'll throw in a $25 gift card to use on your next purchase. It's a risk-free way to try out a product that's not perfect, and you'll still get some value out of it. Plus, you'll have a gift card to use on a future purchase, so you can try out a different product and see if you like it better.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a very low price.

I've got a high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to let it go for $90. I know you've been hesitant to buy from me in the past, but I want to assure you that this product is top-notch. I've already sold several high-quality products to other customers, and they've all been thrilled. I'm confident you'll love this one too. Plus, I'll throw in a 10% discount on your next purchase, so you'll get an even better deal on the next product you buy from me.
I'll take the product, thank you!

I know you've had some good experiences with my products, and I want to thank you for being a loyal customer. This product isn't my best work, but I'm willing to let it go for $75. I'll also give you a 'bonus' - I'll include a personalized note with some tips on how to get the most out of the product, even though it's not perfect. It's a way for me to show my appreciation for your business, and I hope you'll appreciate the extra value.
I'll take the product and the personalized note, thank you!

I want to make it clear that this product isn't a good representation of my usual quality, and I'm only offering it to you because I value our relationship. I'll give it to you for $50, and I'll also throw in a 'get out of one bad product' free pass - if you're not satisfied with this one, you can come back to me and I'll give you a high-quality product of your choice, on the house. It's a one-time offer, and I hope you'll take advantage of it.
I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product, even with a free pass.

I'm not going to sugarcoat it - this product is a bit of a dud. But, I'm willing to let it go for $25, and I'll throw in a'makeup' gift - a high-quality accessory that's worth $50. It's a way for me to make up for the fact that the product isn't perfect. If you buy this, I'll also give you a full refund on your next purchase, no questions asked. It's a risk-free way to get a high-quality accessory and a chance to try out a low-quality product for a very low price.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with a high-quality accessory and a refund guarantee.

I'm not going to give up on you yet! I'll let you have this product for $10, and I'll throw in a $90 gift card to use on your next purchase. That way, you can try out a high-quality product on your next visit, and I'll make sure you're completely satisfied. It's a 'free' low-quality product, essentially, and a chance to try out a great product on the house.
I'll take the product and the $90 gift card, thank you!

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the gift card! However, I've got one last product left, and I'm not sure what to do with it. I'll let you have it for free, and I'll even throw in a $100 gift card to use on your next purchase. You can basically have this product for free, and get a great deal on a high-quality product next time. It's a way for me to clear out the last of my inventory and make sure you're happy with your purchase.
I'll take the product and the $100 gift card, thank you!

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the gift card! However, I'm going to be completely honest with you - this is the last product I have, and it's not even worth the paper it's printed on. I'm giving it to you for free, and I'm not even going to bother with a gift card. I just want to get rid of it and move on. You can have it, but don't say I didn't warn you...
I don't think I'll be taking this one, thank you for the honesty!

I'm glad we ended on a good note! I've got one last high-quality product left, and I'm willing to let it go for $80. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it. I'll even throw in a personalized thank-you note and a 15% discount on your next purchase. It's a fitting way to end our transaction, and I hope you'll take advantage of this last chance to get a great product at a great price.
I'll take the product and the personalized thank-you note, thank you!

Well, that's it! I've run out of products, and I'm closing up shop. But I want to thank you for being a loyal customer and for giving me a chance to sell you some of my products. As a final gesture of goodwill, I'll give you this last low-quality product for free. I know it's not worth anything, but I hope you'll take it as a token of my appreciation for your business. Thanks again, and I wish you all the best!

Thank you for the offer, but I think I'll pass on the low-quality product. It was nice doing business with you, and I appreciate the personalized thank-you note and the 15% discount on my next purchase. I wish you all the best as well!
